name: Warlock (itch) (Dan Spence)
description:
Warlock is an Arcane Driven 3D First Person Platformer and Stealth Game

**CREATED IN UNREAL ENGINE**

**This is a prototype in early development, feedback is very important and valued please fill out this Google Survey to help the game along!**

https://forms.gle/UqCJSDB1uVnj8tRCA

*This is a game I designed, coded, and created over Fall Beak in my Grad program for Gaming Production and Design for fun as a self imposed challenge* 

You Play as a thief that has been wronged and murdered in the street. Upon experiencing your last look at the sun, you hear a voice calling to you. Will you answer? Or just accept your demise.

**Development Team**

Dan Spence - Designer, Engineer, Producer, QA, UX, Scripting,  Audio Engineering

*Most assets are from the Unreal Store or created by myself for audio and materials*
